verbs.description: at north arlington mayor funeral he [V: is] remembered for willingness to help anybody mayor joseph bianchi funeral processional paused in front of his barbershop where a barber chair and fire helmet were set up on the sidewalk barbara kaiser mayor joseph bianchi north arlington
